label: 限制处理个人数据的权利
example: 标准示例：Right to restrict processing: in limited circumstances, you have the right to request that processing is stopped but the data retained.

label: 拒绝处理个人数据的权利
example: 标准示例：Right to object: in certain circumstances (including where data is processed on he basis of legitimate interests or for the purposes of marketing) you may object to that processing.
